tools.name: Recent Headlines
Relations Graph

id.description:
The id of the object found using the Search tool.
Supported:
    - article (ends with six alphanumeric characters)
    - country (like "United States")
    - facet (person, organization like "United Nations")
    - perspective (like "US-China relations")

tools.name: Comments by Author

id.description: The id of the person or organization found using the Search tool.
